//Mensajes toast An error has occurred. Unable to connect to the server. Error! Server response timeout.
Username must be between 3 and 16 characters long. Role must be between 1 and 24 characters long. Email format is invalid. Phone format is invalid. Password must be at least 8 characters long, contain no spaces and contain one letter and one number. Group name must be between 1 and 16 characters long. Description must be between 1 and 24 characters long.
A user already exists with some of the written data. A user with this name already exists The data are incorrect. Error! User not found. The user already exists in the group. Error! The user is an administrator. The administrator cannot be modified. Error! Group not found. Error! Public holiday not found. Error loading calendar. Error! The NFC tag doesn\'t correspond to the group. Error with date and time format. The holiday period overlaps with an existing. The start date cannot be earlier than the end date.
Correct registration. Username edited. Member deleted. Role edited. Group name edited. Group description edited. Group created. Group deleted. Member added. New assistance added. Holiday period added. Public holiday period added.
